0.title: Changelog for TUFLOW CATCH 2025.0.1
0.content: Release date: 05 Mar 2025 . | General Notes | Backwards Compatibility | Bug Fixes . | Licensing | . | .

1.title: General Notes
1.content: This is a patch release for TUFLOW CATCH 2025.0.0.

2.title: Backwards Compatibility
2.content: It is not expected that the 2025.0.1 release would cause changes in results if upgrading from the 2025.0.0 release, except for the specifics of the bug fix listed below.

3.title: Bug Fixes
3.content: Licensing . | A fix was made to activate advanced licensing functionality | .

5.title: Changelog for TUFLOW CATCH 2025.1.0-rc
5.content: . Build version: 2025.1.0-rc.1 . Release date: 17 Apr 2025 . | General Notes | Backwards Compatibility | New Features and Enhancements . | Interventions | Error Reporting | Mass Balance | Demonstration Model Suite | . | Bug Fixes . | Scratch files | . | .

6.title: General Notes
6.content: This is a minor release for TUFLOW CATCH 2025. It includes new features and some bug fixes.

7.title: Backwards Compatibility
7.content: It is not expected that the 2025.1.0 release would cause changes in results if upgrading from the 2025.0.1 release.

8.title: New Features and Enhancements
8.content: Interventions . Major Feature . Support has been added for the dynamic simulation of water quality interventions. These interventions allow for the simulation of the removal of pollutants by stormwater treatment devices such as wetlands, bioretention swales, basins, buffer strips (as in the animation below) or other devices. Any number of interventions can be simulated across a catchment. The way in which pollutants are removed by an intervention is customisable, and information from external studies or modelling packages can be used to configure intervention performance. The TUFLOW CATCH User Manual describes how interventions can be implemented in detail. Error Reporting . Major Feature . Errors are now numbered, and are reported to screen and log file with URLs that point to more detailed error descriptions provided within the TUFLOW wiki as the 5XXX error series. Mass Balance . Support has been added to assess TUFLOW CATCH’s ability to conserve mass under all pollutant export models. Examples are provided in the TUFLOW CATCH User Manual under normal conditions, and when interventions are in place. Demonstration Model Suite . Two models have been added to the Demonstration model suite. These allow for the investigation of mass balance (_008) and provide templates for the implementation of interventions (_009).

9.title: Bug Fixes
9.content: Scratch files . | A fix was made to remove writing of scratch file fort.102 | .

10.title: Changelog for 2025.1.0-rc.1
10.content: This is an interim changelog that accompanies the TUFLOW CATCH 2025.1.0-rc.1 release candidate. The information contained within this interim version may vary from the subsequent final version.

11.title: TUFLOW CATCH Changelog
11.content: New releases are typically linked to the release of major new features and/or improvements in the computational hydraulic engines. Whilst some changes in results can be expected between releases due to computational engine improvements, the intent is not to have any changes in results between minor releases.

12.title: Changelogs
12.content: Below are the changelogs for the TUFLOW CATCH since version 2025.0.0 (2025.0.0 was the first TUFLOW CATCH release and therefore doesn’t itself have a changelog).
